Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Pershing
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Archer, California, 38th and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/Pershing.
